meanings.definition: Able to be found or located.
meanings.sent1: The missing keys were easily locatable on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent2: The treasure map led the pirates to the locatable chest of gold.
meanings.sent3: The locatable squirrel kept hiding nuts in the same spot, making the other animals laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her bright smile was always locatable in a crowd, like a beacon of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The bright red flag made the emergency exit easily locatable in case of a fire.

meanings.definition: Capable of being located or found.
meanings.sent1: The missing cat was finally locatable under the bed.
meanings.sent2: The ancient ruins were locatable deep in the dense jungle.
meanings.sent3: The locatable jigsaw puzzle pieces seemed to play hide and seek with the child.
meanings.sent4: His loud laughter was always locatable in a quiet room, like a burst of joy.
meanings.sent5: The bright neon sign made the restaurant easily locatable from far away.
